誇.definition: to boast; to exaggerate; to praise

誇下海口.definition: see 誇海口|夸海口[kua1 hai3 kou3]

誇多鬥靡.definition: (idiom) to use literary phrases in one's writing to show off one's erudition

誇張.definition: to exaggerate; overstated; exaggerated; hyperbole; (coll.) excessive; ridiculous; outrageous

誇獎.definition: to praise; to applaud; to compliment

誇稱.definition: to praise; to acclaim; to commend; to compliment

誇誇其談.definition: (idiom) to talk big; to sound off; to be full of hot air

誇贊.definition: to praise; to speak highly of; to commend
